title: Locations â€“ KINTO USA, Inc
text: Each KINTO store aims to offer visitors a sensory brand experience. Through interaction with our space and products, we hope that you find inspiration to enrich your everyday life. Tokyo (Nakameguro) KINTO STORE Tokyo Tokyo flagship store offering a wide range of products including tableware KINTO REC STORE Tokyo Concept store focusing on products for outdoor activities as well as for kids & babies Los Angeles KINTO STORE Los Angeles Brand store in Los Angeles also home to the local office for North America. New York KINTO STORE New York Brand store in New York City offering a wide range of products.
